message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $140. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $135, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $137.50. It's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I'm not sure I'm willing to go that high. I was thinking more along the lines of $127.50. Can you meet me at that price?
I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'll meet you at $132.50, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $132.50, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you consider $129?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $131, but that's as low as I can go. It's a good deal for both of us, and I think you'll really like the product.
I'm really close to walking away, but I'm willing to make one last offer. Can you meet me at $128?
